meta.content: Website for Relevant Academy of Eaton County

div.h2: Relevant Academy will be closed Monday March 16, 2020 thru June 19th, 2020

div.p: Relevant Academy will be closed Monday, March 16th, 2020 - Friday, June 19, 2020.Â Students please work virtually - mentors are available.

li.a: 2016-17 Archived Board Meeting Schedule and Minutes

a.span: MI School Data Visit Our Dashboard

div.p: is a tuition-free public school academy for high school aged students who are ready to start again and redefine themselves. Â Our mission is to provide an alternative pathway to earn a high school diploma for students who have struggled to experience success in a traditional setting.
that all people are natural learners, redefining school will redefine attitudes, and with enough support, all types of learners can achieve their goals.
Relevant Academy is accepting applications forÂ 2019-20.Â If you are interested in gaining more information, please call 517-925-5450.

p.strong: *since we are temporarily closed if you are interested in our program please send an email to jvarney@relevantacademy.org
Relevant Academy's campus will be closed Monday, March 16th, 2020 - Monday,Â April 13th, 2020 per the Governor's mandate.Â Students and staff are expected to work virtually from home.
